items.label: Chisa
items.info: The first phase of 2.8 features Chisa as a new character, and a Phoebe rerun! Head into the Ascendant Aces event to get a preview of these characters in a trial stage.

items.info: Saber's banner has been available since July 11, 2025 , in Phase 1 of Version 3.4. It doesn't have a fixed end date yet. Her Light Cone, A Thankless Coronation , is available at the same time through the .
